entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 7:57 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain mixed with freezing rain in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets ending overnight then cloudy. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
